title: Audit the Contract Management Process
description: An auditor reviews the process for managing contracts to identify risks like automatic renewals of unwanted services.

tasks.description: Obtain a list of all active contracts from the contract management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has a complete list of contracts.

tasks.description: Analyze the contract data to identify any contracts that are set to auto-renew within the next 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies 15 contracts approaching their auto-renewal date.

tasks.description: For a sample of these contracts, contact the business owner to verify if the service is still needed and if they are aware of the renewal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that for two contracts, the business owner was unaware of the auto-renewal and no longer needs the service, preventing unnecessary spending.
